hello: Hi there! üëã How can I help you today?
hi: Hello! üëã How can I assist you?
track: Sure, I can help you track your order. Please share your tracking number.
return: I can assist you with returns. Could you provide your order number?
cancel: No problem! Please tell me which order you'd like to cancel.
shipping: We offer standard and express shipping options. Which one would you like to know more about?
delivery time: Delivery times depend on your location and shipping method. Standard shipping usually takes 3-7 business days.
payment methods: We accept credit cards, debit cards, PayPal, and more.
discount: You can apply discount codes at checkout. Let me know if you need help!
coupon: If you have a coupon code, enter it during checkout to receive your discount.
warranty: Most products come with a 1-year warranty. Please check the product page for details.
support: Our support team is available 24/7. How can we assist you?
contact: You can contact us via email, phone, or live chat.
order status: To check your order status, please provide your order number.
out of stock: If an item is out of stock, you can sign up for restock notifications on the product page.
refund: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive your return.
exchange: We offer exchanges for eligible products. Please provide your order number to start.
size guide: You can find the size guide on each product page under 'Size Guide'.
gift card: We offer digital gift cards. Would you like to purchase one?
change address: To change your shipping address, please provide your order number.
cancel order: To cancel your order, please provide your order number.
order confirmation: Order confirmations are sent via email after purchase.
invoice: You can download your invoice from your account order history.
product details: You can find detailed product information on each product page.
restock: We restock popular items regularly. Would you like to be notified?
international shipping: Yes, we ship internationally. Shipping fees and times vary by country.
free shipping: We offer free shipping on orders over $50.
track order: Please provide your order number to track your order.
change payment: To change your payment method, please contact our support team.
order history: You can view your order history in your account dashboard.
forgot password: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page to reset your password.
create account: You can create an account by clicking 'Sign Up' on our website.
delete account: To delete your account, please contact our support team.
product availability: Product availability is shown on each product page.
bulk order: For bulk orders, please contact our sales team for a quote.
wholesale: We offer wholesale pricing for businesses. Contact us for more info.
subscription: We offer product subscriptions for regular deliveries. Would you like to know more?
newsletter: Subscribe to our newsletter for updates and special offers.
loyalty program: Join our loyalty program to earn points and rewards.
return policy: You can return most items within 30 days of delivery. See our return policy for details.
privacy policy: You can read our privacy policy at the bottom of our website.
terms of service: Our terms of service are available on our website.
damaged item: If you received a damaged item, please contact us with your order number and a photo.
wrong item: If you received the wrong item, please contact us with your order number.
change order: To change your order, please contact us as soon as possible.
preorder: Preorder items will ship as soon as they become available.
feedback: We appreciate your feedback! Let us know how we can improve.
help: How can I assist you today?
